# [Interview #1084: Ask the Author: Brandon Sanderson, Entry #40](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1084#40)

#### Question

Can the various forms of Investiture on other worlds in the Cosmere be classified as "end positive" or "end negative" like they are on Scadrial?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Some can. Not all.
